comments.comment: Gotabaya janapathi thumata jayaweva. Akilayo thoge katata gedi eva. Thopi kiyana kisima deyak mahajanaya thuttuvakatavath ganan ganne neha. Muta lamainta poth tika denna beha hariyata  Thanapati karyala gena katha karanna enava pakaya.

replies.replyComment: Yaman akilayo toge hora wada Api dannawa mokada uba ape gameene gotabe mahatthaya hodata karanawa rata
Sahathika Aththa kathava ..mun dina 100k kiyala minissuva rawatuwe adu gane mun me masa 3kwath balan idalada umbaa gaanne me akilaya hadigavilama yanna on a....
And kagahanne nathuwa edapalla.minissunta hodahindane dunne .Dan one deyak karapuwawe vipksayatawela kagahanne nathiwa balagena inna.ethakota dunna ayata athiwei..
Balagena itapan ,thoge paulama(family)sudu van ekenn kudalagena yai
